io.smudgr.app.project

Class Project

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.smudgr.app.project.Project

  • public class Project
extends java.lang.Object
    The Project class tracks the state of all loaded ProjectItem items and their relative hierarchy.

    A Project includes ControllerExtension settings, SourceLibrary locations, the default output path, and the structure and composition of user-configured Smudge components.

    Users are meant to load a single project at a time and treat a project as a unified workspace. The Project contains loaded and configured smudges, which can be added to the rack any number of times in any sequence.

    The Project uses a PropertyMap structure to record a normalized model of itself. The PropertyMap is persisted to and loaded from an XML file with the ".sproj" extension.

    See Also:
    Smudge, ProjectLoader, ProjectSaver
